alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 21 at 1:37PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Alcovy River at New Hope Road near Grayson affecting Gwinnett and Walton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alcovy River at New Hope Road near Grayson. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of the woodlands upstream and downstream from the river gauge at New Hope Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:16 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:16 PM EDT Thursday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.3 feet on 05/05/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
